text: Cng klaw theid (muhammad) phwk than hen læw michı hrux ha kxallxhˌ thrng thahı klangwan mi xyu tlxd pi kæ phwk than cn thung wan ki ya mahˌ phracea xngkh dı lea xun ca kxallxhˌ thi ca na klangkhun ma hı phwk than pheux phwk than ca di phakphxn nı wela nan phwk than mi phicarna tirtrxng du bang hrux
